name: SoftTechnics
tag_list: applications, apps, mobile-apps, software-development, it-services, outsourcing, iphone-developer
overview:
SoftTechnics is an innovative US IT company specializing in system programming and web development, with premium-class delivery centers located in Ukraine. By utilizing our well established channels of professional IT resources, we are always striving to be our customersâ€™ one source for all the IT services they need, now and in the future.

SoftTechnics commitment to the highest standards in all stages of cooperation has enabled us to build our reputation as a professional, reliable business partner. Our experienced management, high level corporate culture and solidly organized business processes produce optimal, innovative solutions which get implemented successfully.

SoftTechnics IT market research is relentless, so that our teams always have state-of-the-art information to successfully exploit the fastest growing IT niches. Currently, SoftTechnics provides its clients with solutions in IT fields ranging from iPhone apps and Facebook services development to Geo Information Systems. Clients desire cost-effective convenience, so we meet and exceed their expectations by using diverse, complex task solutions including: software development; IT consulting, out-staffing and outsourcing; and QA out-staffing.

Our main services are:

Web development; Mobile applications development; GIS solutions; System programming; Software testing services; Custom Software Development; DB development and administration; Network engineering and administration…

SoftTechnics - “Make IT easy”
